modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: The extracted text indicates that the content is likely in English, so I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> tag to improve accessibility.
- Observation: Without the "lang" attribute, screen readers and other assistive technologies might not correctly interpret the language of the content, potentially hindering accessibility for users.
- Action: Add [lang="en"] to the HTML to specify that the language of the content is English.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
